name: WePay, Inc.
description: Provider of an online payment platform designed to accept and process instant payments. The company's online payment platform delivers payments-as-a-service APIs for simple onboarding and activation of payments, without impacting the user experience, enabling enterprises to process instant onboarding and payments without friction or fraud.
one_liner: Provider of an online payment platform designed to accept and process instant payments. The company's online payment platform delivers payments-as-a-service APIs for simple onboarding and activation of payments, without impacting the user experience, enabling enterprises to process instant onboarding and payments without friction or fraud.
